code: import axios from"axios";export const createOrderGhn=orderId=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await axios.post("http://localhost:4000/order/update/".concat(orderId));dispatch({type:"CREATE_ORDER_GHN",payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:"CREATE_ORDER_GHN_FAIL",payload:error});}};export const PrintOrderGhn=orderId=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/order/print/".concat(orderId));window.open(data);dispatch({type:"PRINT_ORDER_GHN",payload:data});}catch(error){}};
